text.0: savitar goldenhaired hath lifted eastward bright with the sunbeams his eternal lustre.
text.1: he in whose energy wise pūṣan marches surveying all existence like a herdsman.
text.2: beholding men he sits amid the heaven filling the two worldhalves and airs wide region.
text.3: he looks upon the rich farspreading pastures between the eastern and the western limit.
text.4: he root of wealth the gathererup of treasures looks with his might on every form and figure.
text.5: savitar like a godẉhose law is constant stands in the battle for the spoil like indra.
text.6: waters from sacrifice came to the gandharva visvavasu o soma when they saw him.
text.7: indra approaching quickly marked their going and looked around upon the suns enclosures.
text.8: this song visvavasu shall sing us meter of airs midrealm celestial gandharva.
text.9: that we may know aright both truth and falsehood may he inspire our thoughts and help our praises.
text.10: in the floods track he found the bootyseeker the rocky cowpens doors he threw wide open.
text.11: these the gandharva told him rowed with amṛta indra knew well the puissancc of the dragons.
